extraAttributes.name: train
extraAttributes.doc: Training sets. These are provided as a dictionary with form ``train[dimension]['labels' or 'inputs'][index]`` and contain 240 labeled vectors for each dimension between 2 and 20.

extraAttributes.name: diff_train
extraAttributes.doc: Diff training sets. These are provided as a dictionary with form ``diff_train[polynomialdegree]['labels' or 'inputs'][index]`` and contain 240 labeled vectors for each polynomial degree between 2 and 20.

extraAttributes.name: test
extraAttributes.doc: Test sets. These are provided as a dictionary with form ``test[dimension]['labels' or 'inputs'][index]`` and contain 60 labeled vectors for each dimension between 2 and 20.

extraAttributes.name: diff_test
extraAttributes.doc: Diff test sets. These are provided as a dictionary with form ``diff_test[polynomialdegree]['labels' or 'inputs'][index]`` and contain 60 labeled vectors for each polynomial degree between 2 and 20.
